name: Vulcan M
overview:
A shooting game from Korean company Rassen, where the player uses a realistic minigun to fight foes through a number of different stages. The minigun has been crafted to simulate the look and feel of a real minigun by providing realistic back blow, releasing empty cartridges during use, and the inclusion of a smoke effect from the barrel of the gun.

The cabinet has a gigantic 100" screen, a reactive foot stand which vibrates throughout play, and also incorporates a full 5.1ch surround sound system - all which further heighten the immersive experience.
